<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RewriteBuffer - As code is rewritten, SourceBuffer&#39;s from the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// input with modifications get a new RewriteBuffer associated with them.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RewriteBuffer captures the modified text itself as well as information used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to map between SourceLocation&#39;s in the original input and offsets in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RewriteBuffer.  For example, if text is inserted into the buffer, any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// locations after the insertion point have to be mapped.</span></CodeLine>
